msbt.message: ! Thanks for your suggestion the other day!You were right, , this island is totally gorgeous! I'm SO excited for my new life here! Let's catch up once I'm done unpacking!

! It's just like you said. This place has SUCH great vibes. I'm SO glad I moved! I can tell this is where the universe wants me to be, you know? Good things are going to happen here.I bet some of those good things are even going to happen to folks who aren't me! Come visit again once I'm done cleaning up, 'K?

I took your advice! I bailed on everything—and everyone—I knew!I moved! Here! I live here now!<10_4 /> Walking distance from your house!<10_4 /> You! The only person I know here!We are going to talk SO MUCH.
Hey, ! Thanks for the chat the other day!Also? Thanks for the moving advice! I totes already love it here on .And, like, how great is it that we're neighbors now?!
Hi, ! After we talked about the other day, I HAD to move.That and my lease was up. So it was, "Do I pay an extra 300 Bells a month or go live near ?"So here I am!
Hi, ! I've moved here to make the hottest musical scene in the world!Once I'm discovered, talent scouts from around the world will swarm the island, looking for the next big thing!

Hey, ! Long time no see! Remember me? It's ! I moved here right after you invited me, but I guess we just kept missing each other, huh?I asked around and other folks said you were, "I dunno. Doin' stuff?" So I figured you'd show up eventually.And I was right! Hi! Now that we both know where the other one is, we should hang out.

Ah<10_10 /> AH-CHOOIE!!!<10_9 />Hi, . Sorry. I'm feeling way gross right nowBut, hey, I did it! I moved here! That's pretty cool, yeah <10_10 />AH-CHOOIE!!!<10_9 />I'm going to go sneeze some more. Let's get together once I feel better.
! Ohmigosh! Guess what?! I live here now! SURPRISE! invited me to move here, so I didbut maybe we covered that already?I'm a little scattered right now because I'm soooo exciiiiiiited!

Hey, ! I did it! The big-time move-to-a- new-island thing!Yep, I came over from after invited me.As soon as I'm settled in, we have GOT to get together. Maybe grab a coffee. You have coffee here, right?

Hi! , right? I'm , from ! said this island's a hot spot for undiscovered celebs like me, so I packed up and moved!You have GOT to show me around the island so I can figure out where I'll be most photogenic.
Hi, ! It's been a while! invited me to move to ! And I was all, "I can't say no!"That's why we're neighbors! Tell me something. How lucky do you feel right now?

Ohmigosh! THERE you are, !It's me, the soon-to-be-famous !Remember ? Well, said I should move here. Soooo I did!I've always been très impressionable. It's bad for overall life stability, but GREAT for ending up in weird places.

Hi, I'd love to hang out and get to know the island, but ahahah<10_10 />AAAACHOOOOOOOO!!!<10_9 />I got a cold. Anyway, I ran into and they told me I should move here.I was all, "That sounds cool." And they were all, "Yeah? So do it!" So I did it. Now I'm here. Sneezing.Anyhoo, I meant to come say hi, but I caught this dumb cold Let's hang soon, though, 'K?
Hey, ! Here I am! Fresh from !I moved here because someone I know invited mebut looks like they've ghosted. No prob, though. After all, you're here, !

Ohmigosh! THERE you are, !Guess who lives here now? ME!I met someone on who was like, "You should move to and be famous."So I packed up and moved! But it looks like they've bailed Boo. I was looking forward to seeing them! Not a prob, ! You and me are going to have all kinds of fun!

Hey, . I caught a cold, which is le ugh. I just moved here because<10_10 />ACHOOIE!!!<10_9 />I was saying, I moved here because someone from here invited me, but they've smoke bombed. Poof. Gone! It's, like, kind of a shame, but I'm glad you're here, . Let's do a thing once I'm better, 'K?
That's right, ! is BACK!This island is the LEGIT perfect place for me after all. Who knew? Def not me!I'm going to clean up super fast so we can totes hang out really soon.

Long time, no see! I decided to bring the world tour back to !Life on was I'm going to say "awesome." But I gotI'm going to say "homesick."I'm, like, crackling with excitement that we get to be neighbors again, !
Hi there, I decided to move back to this isl-ah-ah <10_10 />ACHOOIE!!!<10_9 />But I think all the stress from the move has finally caught up to me.Once I'm better, let's hang out. 'K?

It's ! Right here in my new fabode!Do you like "fabode"? It's "fabulous" and "abode" smooshed together and made one syllable shorterI'm considering trademarking it for use as a pop-star interior designer.<10_4 /> "I'll make your homeA FABODE!"Sorry. I got sidetracked. What was I talking about?
What the hey?! ?! You live on ?!<10_4 /> I JUST moved here too! Coooooool. Now we can have fun whenever!
? Fab! It's me! ! From ! I live on this island now. I had. ZERO idea that you lived here. This is tastic!
? Do you, um, remember me? It's !I used to do the whole "living" thing on , but I totes "live" here now! I had no idea you lived here too!

?! Hey. It's me. ! You remember me, ri-i-i<10_10 />ACHOOIE!<10_9 />Ugh. Sorry about the nose spray I scored a totes grody cold leaving <10_10 />ACHOOIE!<10_9 />Ooof. Hey, let's hang once I'm all fab again, 'K? Sniffle
Oh! Hey! Thanks for your suggestion the other day! You were right, this island is le GORGEOUS!I'm SO excited for my new life here. Let's catch up once I'm done unpacking!

! It's just like you said. This place has SUCH great vibes. I'm SO glad I moved! I can tell this is where the universe wants me to be, you know? Good things are going to happen here.I bet some of those good things are even going to happen to folks who aren't me! Come visit again once I'm done cleaning up, 'K?

Hi, ! I've moved here to make the hottest musical scene in the world!Once I'm discovered, talent scouts from around the world will swarm the island, looking for the next big thing!

Hey, ! Long time no see! Remember me? It's ! I moved here right after you invited me, but I couldn't find you!I thought I got the wrong island, but here you are, still being the best I've ever known!Now that I've finally found you I'll see you later!

Ah<10_10 />AH-CHOOIE!!!<10_9 />Hi, . Sorry. I'm feeling like le garrbahj right now.But, hey, I did it. I moved here. That's pretty cool, riii<10_10 />AH-CHOOIE!!!<10_9 />Hit me up once I'm feeling more fabulous, 'K?

Hi, ! Thanks for the chat at the campsite! I moved here as soon as I could!You were totes right! This island is A<10_5 />MAZ<10_5 />ING! I'm SO excited to live here now!Let's chat our faces off once I'm done unpacking, 'K?!

! It's like you said at the campsite! This place has such great vibes. I'm SO glad I moved! I can tell this is where the universe wants me to be, you know? Good things are going to happen here.I bet some of those good things are even going to happen to folks who aren't me! Come visit again once I'm done cleaning up, 'K?

I took your advice! I bailed on everything—and everyone—I knew!I moved! Here! I live here now!<10_4 /> Walking distance from your house!<10_4 /> You! The only person I know here!We are going to talk SO MUCH.
Heeeey ! Thanks for your suggestion back at the campsite! I'm here, just like I promised! And I'm already in love with !I'm so pumped I get to be neighbors with you, !

! I finally get to say hi to you on !Thanks for inviting me back at the campsite! I actually moved here right after that. I mean RIGHT after.Like, I'm not even sure you were back home yet and I was packing my things. Get ready, ! We are going to have ALL THE FUN!
Ohmigosh, it's ! I moved to , just like I said I would! Your invite back at the campsite totes made this happen. You altered the entire course of my lifeYou! You did this.

I moved here after you invited me at the campsite, but I couldn't find you to say hi!Hi, !You were SO right. This island is legit trendy! I'm fitting right in since I am, after all, le Queen du Trend!See you around, !

Ah<10_10 />ACHOO!<10_9 />Ugh, sorry I'm like, way, waaaay grodyville right nowIt's good to see you, though. I moved right after you invited me at the campsite. I really want to hang out!Swing by for a chat once I'm all better, !

Hi, ! It's fab to see you again. B-T-dubs, I live here now!I bumped into while I was hanging at the campsite. We started talkingAnd before you know it, I decided to move here! Totes rando life choice, but way fun, !

Hi, ! invited me to move here, and I figuredmoving somewhere new is SUCH a cool way to grow as a person and as a brand!Now that I'm on , I'm ready to introduce everybody to future celebrity, !That's me, by the way.
Oh! Hi, . Remember me? It's ! I was at the campsite when invited me to move here! Sooooo now I live here! Now we can hang out whenevs! This is the coolest, !
Hey, . It's been a minute, huh? <10_4 />Guess why I'm here!I was camping here when invited me to move in full-time! Since this island has you and , I was like, "YES. DUH!"Then moved here le stat!

Ooh! I finally found you, ! It's me, !I was camping here when invited me to hang out full-time! So I packed up and moved! Sorry I couldn't say hi sooner. Let's make up for it by hanging out ALL the time!
Ohhey, .<10_10 />ACHOO!!!<10_9 />I was visiting the campsite here when invited me to stick around. Then I caught a cold while I was moving and I feel très ugh. Let's hang out when I feel better, 'K?

Hey, ! It's ! I moved to this island! I was actually invited by someone I met at the campsitebut it looks like they ghosted. , OHMIGOSH am I glad I've got you here! I'm sooo excited to start my new life!

THERE you are, ! I live here now! Isn't that fabuloso?I met a pal from at the campsite here who said, "Hey, you should move here!" I was all, "Cool. I'll move there." But now I'm here and my friend's popped off to who knows whereI was feeling really alone And sad ButI found you, ! Everything's fantabulosorific now, !

Hello Oh. Hi, . I moved to this island and I, like, IMMEDIATELY caught a cold.I feel sooooo grrrrooss <10_10 />ACHOO!<10_9 />I'm a beautiful flower, floating in a sea of nose gunk.Oh yeah! And then the person who invited me has gone full witness protection!Poof! Gone from the island without a trace, leaving me heresick. And alone.Except, I'm not alone, am I? You're here, . Once I'm over this cold, let's hang out!
Remember how you invited me to when I was visiting the campsite here? Well, here I am!I've still got a pile of unpacking to do, but let's hang out tomorrow, .

Hey, ! Thanks for hanging at the campsite! I've got to unpack, but I'm here now! is AMAZING! I already liked it here when I was camping, but I'm def in love now! You've got to show me ALL the sights! I need good spots for my album-cover photo shoots!
Hey, it's ! Haven't seen your face since the campsite!Well, as of today, has its first celebrity! Me! I'm sooo psyched! I can't wait to finish unpacking so I can go say hi to everyone!
Ohmigosh! !<10_4 /> I'm here now, just like we talked about back at the campsite!It totes feels different from when I was camping here. But, like, in a good way! It feels like home!

! Here I am, just like I promised!I've been looking forward to living on ever since you invited me back at the campsite Ohmigosh, AND we can hang out now, just, whenevs! Moving here was the best call ever, !
Squeee! I knew I'd bump into you again, ! I haven't seen you since the campsite!So we're neighbors now, huh? How weird is that?! It's totes weird, but très cool, .

Oh! ! How've you been?Remember when you invited me to move here? At the campsite?<10_4 /> I totes moved! Like, right after that!Kinda weird we haven't bumped into each other, huh? Were you hiding from me? You weren't, were you?I'm kidding! I'm here now to be your bestie! And you can be my bestie too, !

Uuuuugh! Oh. Hi, . I moved here, just like we talked about at the campsite. But I caught this cold, and uuuuugh, I can't do anything but eat soup and watch TV.I really want to hang out once I'm done sneezing everywhere, .

Hey! How've you been, ?!I was hanging out at the campsite here and got invited to move to the island. Le whaaaat, am I right?I was all, "Live in a totes beautiful place AND be adjacent? Yes. Please!"I still need to get unpacked, but that'll be over faster than a fad. Let's hang tomorrow, !
! Guess who just moved here?<10_4 /> Me! That's who! invited me when I visited the campsite and I thought it sounded like an adventure! OK! Time to finish unpacking so we can have fun tomorrow!
Hey, ! How've you been?I live on now! invited me to move in while I was hanging out at your campsite! I've been living it up on beautiful for a bit now and it's très fantastique, !

Hey! ! It's been a while, huh? Do you remember me?I'm !Yeah, so invited me to move here when I was visiting the campsite, annndI moved here! The vibe is totes different when you live here compared to when you're camping here! But GOOD different! Anyhoo, we're neighbors now and I thought you might like to know!

Whoa, long time no see! Guess what?! I moved here! Yeah! To ! invited me when I was at the campsite. I thought, that sounds like fun. I like fun. Let's do it!And I'm so glad I did, ! This place is faaaaaantastic!

Oh. Hi, . invited me to stay when I visited your campsite It sounded fun, so I moved. But then I caught this dumb cold. I was so hyped to have fun with the neighbors too I'm going to relax until I'm better. But let's hang soon, .

! How are you?! So good to see a familiar face.Some goof at the campsite invited me to move here so I, you know, moved here. But they've totes bailed!So, anyhoowe're neighbors now! And also new best friends? I thiiiiink soooooNEW BEST FRIENDS!

Hey, it's been a while! Guess what? I moved to !I was at the campsite when some island rando said, "You oughta move here!" And I said it sounded greatExcept that rando up and bailed! What is their sitch? They figure it's cool to invite and then disappear?Know what? Doesn't matter! Because I've got you, and YOUR sitch is that you're cool. Let's hang out a BUNCH!

Hi, . You must be surprised to see me, huh?I moved here because someone invited me when I was at the campsite.But then they took off to the moon or something. I don't know why you'd ever leave this islandbut they sure did. Now I have this lame cold. I was so ready to meet the neighbors too I'm going to relax at home until I feel better, but let's hang out really soon, .
